channel.title: R on Kevon Davenport's Github Site
channel.description: Recent content in R on Kevon Davenport's Github Site

item.title: Nikola Jokic For MVP
item.description: The NBA MVP race has been discussed a lot with the regular season being nearly complete. One man has stood far above others in my eyes, Mr. Nikola Jokic. Averaging about 26 points per game, he has his team sitting in fourth place in the Eastern Conference standings. Let’s take a look at the numbers! library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching packages ─────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.3.1 ── ## ✓ ggplot2 3.3.3 ✓ purrr 0.

item.title: Is Jonathan Taylor the RB of the future?
item.description: Former Wisconsin Running Back Jonathan Taylor was a monster in college. Averaging over 2,000 yards a season, Taylor was a large contributor to Wisconsin’s successful offense. The NFL was no different for Mr. Taylor. His Indianapolis Colt’s had a promising 11-5 season that I’m sure Jonathan played a major roll in. Let’s look at some statistics! library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching packages ─────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.3.0 ── ## ✓ ggplot2 3.3.2 ✓ purrr 0.

item.title: Text Cleaning
item.description: Loading the tidyverse and ggalt library into my notebook. library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching packages ────────────────── ## ✓ ggplot2 3.3.2 ✓ purrr 0.3.4 ## ✓ tibble 3.0.3 ✓ dplyr 1.0.2 ## ✓ tidyr 1.1.2 ✓ stringr 1.4.0 ## ✓ readr 1.3.1 ✓ forcats 0.5.0 ## ── Conflicts ── tidyverse_conflicts() ── ## x dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ## x dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() library(ggalt) ## Registered S3 methods overwritten by 'ggalt': ## method from ## grid.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
